item.title: Stars and the Underground
item.description: Stars and the Underground Is the solo project of John Mason (Winterland) based in Auckland, New Zealand. John plays a unique brand of Post Punk incorporating Shoegaze textures and Dark Synthwave vibes. Our single “Nosferatu Upon Tyne” was released in August 2020 and received airplay in New Zealand, Australia, Mexico, Peru, Argentina, Canada, Greece, Germany, UK, France and the US. Nosferatu was also included on the US compilation UnObscured Comp Vol 2 2020 along side bands like Altar De Fey Shadow Assembly and Ashes Fallen.
